channel.title: Australian Jewish News on Liam Getreu
channel.description: Recent content in Australian Jewish News on Liam Getreu

item.title: Australian Jewish News: Time to end the occupation
item.description: The Australian Jewish News published my op-ed marking fifty years of Israel’s occupation of the Palestinian territories.

item.title: Labor’s resolution ‘doesn’t undermine support for Israel’
item.description: The Australian Jewish News published my op-ed on resolutions about Israel-Palestine at Labor’s recent national conference.
